= Introduction =

Any middle-age computer nerd still believes there's a tiny Tron World inside their computer... here's how to explore it using Google Earth :)

= Requirements =

squid to block icons
Layers to enable/disable (road, traffic, borders, clouds)
Preferences to set
enable View -> Sun, set time to early morning.

= KML/KMZ = 

darken earth

= Invisible TTF font = 

remove those pesky road names
